content:
Dear all,
we're currently writing a technical case report which includes a IBM FHIR Server.
Is there any publication which should be cited/mentioned within the paper or will the Link to https://www.ibm.com/products/fhir-server or https://ibm.github.io/FHIR/ be enough?
I think that a link to the project website at https://ibm.github.io/FHIR should be sufficient. Looking forward to seeing more about your work.
